member.name: M:Extensions.Data.Oracle.ExecuteMethods.ExecuteDataSet(Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleConnection,System.String,Oracle.DataAccess.Client.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Executes query against an Oracle database and returns a dataset.

member.name: M:Extensions.Data.Oracle.ExecuteMethods.IsStoredProcedure(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether [is stored procedure] [the specified query].
